snippet: In response to a Twitter post about the fatal shooting of Michael Brown by a police officer, a user wrote: “I know someone sitting on the grand jury. There isn’t enough at this point to warrant an arrest.”
abstract: St Louis County prosecutor is investigating possible leak, via a Twitter post, by a grand juror in case of Darren Wilson, Ferguson, Mo, police officer who shot and killed 18-year-old Michael Brown in August.
lead_paragraph: In response to a Twitter post about the fatal shooting of Michael Brown by a police officer, a user wrote: “I know someone sitting on the grand jury. There isn’t enough at this point to warrant an arrest.”

headline.main: Possible Leak by Grand Juror Is Investigated in Ferguson Police Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Possible Leak by Ferguson Grand Juror
